rules.allow: list, read: if isSignedIn(); update: if isUser(userId);

create: if isSignedIn() && request.auth.uid == request.resource.data.from.uid; read, delete: if isSignedIn() && (request.auth.uid == resource.data.from.uid || request.auth.uid == resource.data.to.uid);
read, create: if isSignedIn() && get(/databases/$(database)/documents/rooms/$(roomId)).data.participants[request.auth.uid] == true; update, delete: if false;
